title: She Found Love Again At Christmas | A Wedding For Christmas | Hallmark Romance Movie

sources.title: She Found Love Again At Christmas | A Wedding For Christmas | Hallmark Romance Movie
sources.description:
She Found Love Again At Christmas | A Wedding For Christmas | Hallmark Romance Movie - Haley, a talented wedding planner from the city, heads back to her charming hometown to help her sister with a Christmas wedding. Surrounded by twinkling lights, snow-dusted streets, and festive holiday cheer, she reconnects with a first love she never forgot. As they work together to create the perfect holiday celebration, sparks fly, old feelings resurface, and Haley discovers that sometimes the greatest gifts come in the form of love, family, and the magic of Christmas.

Enjoy A Wedding For Christmas, a full Hallmark Christmas Movie 2025 that brings the magic of the holidays to life. This heartwarming holiday romance movie follows reunited lovers and first love set against a snowy winter backdrop. Filled with Christmas love, family moments, and festive cheer, it is a full free romantic movie for anyone who loves romantic Christmas movies. Watch the Christmas wedding planner bring love home in this winter romance movie, a holiday romance full movie full of Christmas magic, warmth, and holiday spirit.

Stars: Cristine Prosperi, Colton Little, Vivica A. Fox
